name: Zhuangbin Chen
content: Zhuangbin Chen - Sun Yat-sen University Hi, I am Zhuangbin Chen, currently an Assistant Professor at the School of Software Engineering, Sun Yat-sen University. I work on Distributed Systems, Software Reliability, Cloud Computing, and LLM Systems. More specifically, I am interested in improving the reliability, efficiency, and troubleshooting process of distributed systems. Prior to SYSU, I obtained a Ph.D. at the Computer Science and Engineering Department of The Chinese University of Hong Kong. I was privileged to work with Prof. Michael R. Lyu. Updates 09/2025 One paper accepted to ICSE '26! Congrats to the authors! 09/2025 Two papers accepted to ASE '25! Congrats to the authors! 01/2025 Two papers accepted to FSE '25! Congrats to the authors! 07/2023 One paper accepted to ISSRE '23! Congrats to the authors! 01/2023 Three papers accepted to ICSE '23! Congrats to the authors! 01/2023 I will be joining the School of Software Engineering of Sun Yat-sen University. 07/2022 Our project LogPAI: An Open-Source Project for Automated Log Analysis won The First IEEE Open Software Services Award!
